::Fenox::

Fenox's eyes widened as D stood up to full height. He was huge! 
Amazed, she reached out and stroked his fur with one hand. This was 
one big bot. Big beast modes like these wern't too common these days.

"Huh?" she shook herself back to attention, looking up at D's 
optics. "Oh. Yeah, this is earth. You're at the Alliance base."

She gestures behind herself, showing the Iron Fist.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * D simply crouched there and watched Fenox, his attention 
ocasionally 
> grasped by other transformers from time to time. But sooner or 
later he 
> looked back towards the female, finding that he wasn't so nervouse 
around 
> her as of if he was just left alone.
> D slowly uncurled from his ball so that he was standing on all 
fours like 
> some giant wolf, his back reaching the height of Fenox's optics.
> He was no small beast!
> But, he kept close to Fenox all the same. Besides, she was the only 
familiar 
> part of this world he knew of at the moment.
> D swung his head around so that he was nearly looking Fenox in the 
face, 
> catching her words and understanding them perfectly.
> Earth? Is that where he was? This place was called that?
> He looked at the fembot in a puzzled way.*
> 
> " E-a-r-t-h?"
> 
> * It sounded clumsy but he still mannaged to say what he had heard 
her call 
> this place.
> D failed, however, to catch the remainder of the sentance, about 
the war he 
> just happened to drop in on. Though he really didn't care, he was 
just on a 
> world of wonders and was eager to learn.*
> 
> 
> 
>
